segments.text: Good afternoon . Can I be of service ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know . Can I purchase Treasury Certificates here at this counter ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , of course . We have Treasury Notes with two , three and five-year terms available .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Two years is fine , with a value of 1,000 RIB .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , could I take a look at some ID please , like a passport ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here you go . By the way , is it possible to cash them before the maturity comes up ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I'm afraid that isn't possible . You must wait until maturity before you cash them .
segments.speaker: S1
